title: The President Wants To Eat Grass - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai
tags: College/University   Depression   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Heartwarming   Love at First Sight   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Secret Crush   Smart Couple   Suicides
author: Shili Fireworks   十里烟花
description:
Rong Xi stutters easily when he is nervous, but on the first day of school, his sister Rong Qin drags him to the Debate Club to sign up. He wanted to leave, but he didn’t expect the president to be the male god he had a crush on for many years.

From then on, Rongxi began the day and night training (xi) by the male god (tiao).

Classmate A: Isn’t the president always so cold? Why can that freshman follow every day? almost like they are living together!

Classmate B: It is said that this is the tradition of the Debate team (⊙o⊙)…

Classmate C: As a senior graduate student of this school, why don’t I have this tradition?

Classmate D: Mr. President just issued it this year…the tradition…　>
